column1: Little Goat Diner////I just had breakfast here
column2: but it was pretty amazing. Get the bullseye french toast
column3: decadent egg in the basket french toast
column6: and strawberries. If you don't like a runny yolk
column7: I suppose this could gross you out
column8: but otherwise this is a must-get item. Throw in a side of the hash browns because this isn't your local diner's hash browns...there's cheese in them thar hash browns.
